summary: During the reign of the eighth shogun of the Tokugawa shogunate, the Yunagaya Domain in the Tohoku region is a small han. But at the han, there is a gold mine. Suddenly, Masaatsu Naito of ... See full summary »
cast: Kuranosuke Sasaki|Kyoko Fukada|Tsuyoshi Ihara|Masahiko Nishimura|Takanori Jinnai|Yasufumi Terawaki|Seiji Rokkaku|Yusuke Kamiji|Tokio Emoto|Ennosuke Ichikawa IV|Renji Ishibashi|Rina Chinen|Yuri Chinen
title: Chô kôsoku! Sankin kôtai
